name: The fly in the web | La mosca en la telaraña
description:
17 of 46. 
.
I am the spider 
I am the fly 
And I fall into my own web 
I devour myself.
.
Chromatic circle series .
.
Collection of 46 works each illustration represents a color of the chromatic circle together make the whole path of colors in a given scale , each illustration is a monochrome of the color they represent .
.
Each illustration has a content of shibari, a Japanese erotic art , two collections in one .
.
Shibari forms bodies interacting with ropes and colors that make a complete tour of the colors of light. 
.
Each of the illustrations represents a different element to the previous one, creating an ecosystem between all of them where they cyclically coexist in the color system.
